channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description: ok so i got windows 7 and java 64bit but when i dl clients on servers it says" java " is not a recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file."press any key to continue". and this is what says it the run command " @echo off cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 pause " Please help

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @blue_eggs blue_eggs
item.description:
@blue_eggs wrote:

didnt work… when i did it and opened it it just Xed right away

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

@echo off ECHO You may now close this window cd src "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe"-Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 exit

Try that

Read full topic

ok so i got windows 7 and java 64bit but when i dl clients on servers it says" java " is not a recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.“press any key to continue”. and this is what says it the run command
" @echo off
cd src
java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1
pause "
Please help
